title: Biden Says Witnesses Who Defy Jan. 6 Panel’s Subpoenas Should Be Prosecuted
sub_head: House Democrats are seeking contempt of Congress charge against former Trump aide Steve Bannon
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden said Friday that witnesses who defy subpoenas from a House panel investigating the Jan. 6 assault on the U.S. Capitol should be prosecuted, contradicting White House assertions that those decisions would be made independently by the Justice Department.
Mr. Biden, returning to the White House after a trip to Connecticut, was asked about those who have defied the subpoenas from the House Select Committee seeking their testimony.
